thread.title: BRIEF-Quotient Sees FY 2018 Revenue $24.1 Million To $24.6 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Quotient Sees FY 2018 Revenue $24.1 Million To $24.6 Million
text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Quotient Ltd:
* QUOTIENT LIMITED UPDATES ON STATUS OF MOSAIQ PERFORMANCE AND PROVIDES THIRD QUARTER FISCAL 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $24.1 MILLION TO $24.6 MILLION * ‍TOTAL REVENUE FOR FISCAL YEAR ENDING MARCH 31, 2018 IS NOW EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $24.1 TO $24.6 MILLION​
* ‍PRODUCT SALES FOR FISCAL YEAR ENDING MARCH 31, 2018 ARE NOW EXPECTED TO BE $23.3 TO $23.8 MILLION​
* SEES ‍OPERATING LOSS IN RANGE OF $70.0 TO $75.0 MILLION FOR FISCAL YEAR ENDING MARCH 31, 2018​
* QTRLY ‍LOSS PER SHARE $0.47​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
